entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Since I know you are hung up on ratings, look at the polling for who's handling the COVID-19 situation better. 71% of New Yorkers think Gov. Cuomo is doing a good job while only 38% think you are. It seems like the only person that needs to spend less time talking is you.
